Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player
      • model.HumanPlayer

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HumanPlayer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Territory attackFrom()
      determines the territory to attack from during a turn, territory must have at least 2 armies
      Territory attackTo(Territory attackFrom)
      Determines the territory that is being attacked by finding an adjacent territory that is owned by another player.
      void placeArmy()
      During the start of the game, choose a territory in which to claim, then place remaining armies.
      void reinforceArmies(Territory takeArmy, Territory reinforceThis)
      For iteration 2, at the end of turn, player is allowed to reinforce by pulling armies from one country and placing them in another country

    • Method Detail

      • placeArmy

        public void placeArmy()
        Description copied from class: Player
        During the start of the game, choose a territory in which to claim, then place remaining armies. During turns, place armies until all armies for that turn are placed. Each time you place only one army.
        Specified by:
        placeArmy in class Player

      • attackFrom

        public Territory attackFrom()
        Description copied from class: Player
        determines the territory to attack from during a turn, territory must have at least 2 armies
        Specified by:
        attackFrom in class Player
        Returns:
        the territory to attack from

      • attackTo

        public Territory attackTo(Territory attackFrom)
        Description copied from class: Player
        Determines the territory that is being attacked by finding an adjacent territory that is owned by another player.
        Specified by:
        attackTo in class Player
        Parameters:
        attackFrom - the territory that is attacking
        Returns:
        the territory that is being attacked

      • reinforceArmies

        public void reinforceArmies(Territory takeArmy,
                   Territory reinforceThis)
        Description copied from class: Player
        For iteration 2, at the end of turn, player is allowed to reinforce by pulling armies from one country and placing them in another country
        Specified by:
        reinforceArmies in class Player
        Parameters:
        takeArmy - the territory selected to take armies from
        reinforceThis - the territory selected to move the armies too.
